content: if you re looking for something bright and fun to crochet then this rainbow snake pattern is perfect for you with a light weight yarn and a 3 25 mm d crochet hook you will be able to create a vibrant amigurumi snake in two different sizes in the step-by-step instructions provided in my post you will learn how to make the snake from start to finish get ready to be amazed at your own colorful creation if you d like to make the small stripey snake you will need 1 mandala craft cake in your chosen color and a 3 25 mm d crochet hook the finished small stripey snake measures 13 inches in length not including the tongue and 2 25 inches in circumference when stuffed the large rainbow snake measures 36 25 inches long not including the tongue and 3 25 inches in circumference ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2023 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
